# MedCMU HPC Documentation

> Official documentation for the High-Performance Computing (HPC) infrastructure at the Faculty of Medicine, Chiang Mai University (MedCMU). This site provides guides on accessing the cluster, managing resources, using software modules, and submitting jobs via SLURM.

## General
- [Introduction](docs/intro): Overview of the MedCMU HPC services and infrastructure.
- [Rules and Guidelines](docs/Rules%20and%20Guidelines): Usage policies, data privacy rules, and community guidelines.

## Documentation (Technical Guides)
- [Apptainer Containers](docs/Documentation/apptainer): Guide to using Apptainer for containerized workloads.
- [Connect Server](docs/Documentation/connect-server): Instructions for connecting to the HPC cluster via SSH.
- [Data Transfer](docs/Documentation/data-transfer): How to transfer files to and from the HPC system.
- [Environment Modules](docs/Documentation/environment-modules): Managing software environments using Lmod.
- [First Apptainer Container](docs/Documentation/first-apptainer-container): A step-by-step tutorial for your first container job.
- [Jupyter Lab](docs/Documentation/jupyter): Running Jupyter Lab sessions on the cluster.
- [Parabricks Netflow](docs/Documentation/parabricks-netflow): using NVIDIA Parabricks for genomics analysis.
- [RStudio](docs/Documentation/rstudio): Accessing RStudio Server on the HPC.
- [Slurm Job Submission](docs/Documentation/use-slurm): Comprehensive guide to the SLURM workload manager.
- [Unix Commands](docs/Documentation/unix-command): Essential Linux commands for HPC users.
- [Variant Effect Predictor (VEP)](docs/Documentation/vep): Running VEP for variant annotation.
- [Virtual Environments](docs/Documentation/virtaul-env): Creating and managing Python virtual environments.
- [Virtual Machine Screen](docs/Documentation/virutal-screen): Using `screen` or `tmux` for persistent sessions.
- [Open OnDemand](docs/Documentation/OnDemand): accessing the HPC via the web-based Open OnDemand portal.

## Standard Operating Procedures (SOP)
- [Account Creation](docs/SOP/User/account-creation): Steps for new users to request an HPC account.
- [Request Resources](docs/SOP/User/request-resources): Procedure for requesting compute resources and storage.
- [Job Submission](docs/SOP/User/job-submission): Standard operating procedure for submitting and monitoring jobs.
- [Software Access](docs/SOP/User/software-access): How to request new software installations.
- [Data Management](docs/SOP/User/data-management): Guidelines for data storage, backup, and deletion.
- [Getting Assistance](docs/SOP/User/getting-assistance): Channels for technical support and help.
